metadata.Title: CVE-2014-1640 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: axiom-test.sh in axiom 20100701-1.1 uses tempfile to create a safetemporary file but appends a suffix to the original filename and writes tothis new filename, which allows local users to overwrite arbitrary filesvia a symlink attack on the new filename.

criterions.comment: axiom: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
